H2377.def: = series of pictures or events in mind of sleeping person; ≈ associated with things that disappear in a moment

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3069.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H123.def: = man; usually referred to as {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6735.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing in the form of an image or a drawing; ► functioning in non-sanctioned rituals or as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H959.def: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

H2087.def: = state in which humans have an exalted status in their own eyes, resulting in a failure to see the limits of what is permitted or appropriate in view of one's status, and act accordingly; ≈ often associated with sin, disobedience, foolishness, aggression, and rebellion against God

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H5377.def: = action with which a person gives money or something of value to another person with the expectation that it will be paid back or returned

H2288.def: = area that is difficult to reach, ◄ located within mountains or rocks, ► which people may use as a temporary or permanent dwelling-place; ≈ and is regarded as relatively safe

H4791.def: = a position of a relatively high elevation above the earth

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H1361.def: = state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

H5404.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H7064.def: = structure, made by birds ◄ from twigs, straw, grass, or other materials, ► to lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H3556.def: = celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

4.gl: to cause to be high above

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H1589.def: = action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H8219.def: literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the {L:hill-country<SDBH:הַר>} and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill-country; known for its {L:olive trees<SDBH:זַיִת>} and {L:sycamore trees<SDBH:שִׁקְמָה>}

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H8111.def: = town; ◄ constructed by king {L:Omri<SDBH:עָמְרִי>}; ► capital of northern {L:Israelite<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} kingdom until it was conquered by {L:Assyrians<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}; ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3467.def: = action by which humans or deities help themselves in a (difficult) situation

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6215.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and older brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H4410.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
